title: Mines of Khazad-Dum (3R3)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time you play a [Dwarven] tale, you may heal a Dwarf companion.
Lore:	”'Moria! Moria! Wonder of the Northern world!'”
Rarity:	R
